column5: Trendy 3 bedroom in the heart of South Austin. Steps from the bus downtown / Zilker. Beautiful backyard with BBQ, outdoor stereo, hammock, and Texas Live Oaks. A perfect place to recharge after a day of live music. Large TV and surround in the family room and master. Double vanity. 2 shower/baths. Very well appointed kitchen.   Tempurpedic in the master. Stearns and Foster in the guest. Very comfy futon in the office. Blow up in the loft and 2 large comfy couches.
column8: Bright Open House Ready For SXSW
